categoriesExplanation: The primary category chosen is 'Indoor biking' with a score of 1.0, due to the clear emphasis on cycling in the title ('METABOLIC BOOSTING cycling workout'), channel name ('Kaleigh Cohen Cycling'), and throughout the description, which details a cycling workout with RPM recommendations and resistance levels.
